item.title: How to Manage Timers in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Add a Timer: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Delete a Timer: With Click With Right Click With Menu No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Add a Timer With Click Step 1: First switch to Timer mode. In the lower right click the “+” or “Add new timer” button. Step 2: In the “Add new timer” window that opens, click the arrow buttons to set the time, then click the “Save” button.
